name: Machinarium
description:
This script will install "Machinarium Collector's Edition" GOG edition with support for modern computer configuration.
During install please let all options by default.
Thanks to the people who helped us play this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- This script installer is only compatible with the Windows game setup file provided by GOG.
- FYI only the Windows and MacOSX versions are Collector's Edition, the Linux version is older and have issues issues on new Linux distributions.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

files.gog: N/A:Please select the Windows setup game file downloaded from GOG

content:
custom-name: Machinarium Collector's Edition - GOG - Wine
files:
- gog: N/A:Please select the Windows setup game file downloaded from GOG
- inno: https://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/innoextract-1.8-linux.tar.xz
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Machinarium/Machinarium.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Preparing wineprefix...
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/
    file: inno
- execute:
    args: --extract $gog --output-dir $CACHE
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Machinarium/
    src: $CACHE/app
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Machinarium/"; rm -f -r __support goggame-1207659017.*
      webcache.zip
wine:
  Desktop: true
